metadata.title: CVE-2019-3812 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: QEMU, through version 2.10 and through version 3.1.0, is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds read of up to 128 bytes in the hw/i2c/i2c-ddc.c:i2c_ddc() function. A local attacker with permission to execute i2c commands could exploit this to read stack memory of the qemu process on the host.

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.1+dfsg-2ubuntu3').
